full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS GDUGS DKAR MO CAN LA BRTEN NAS BYABS KHRUS BYED TSUL SDIG MUN KUN SEL PHAN BDE RGYAS PA'I 'DAB BRGYA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA GDUGS DKAR MO CAN LA BRTEN NAS BYABS KHRUS BYED TSUL SDIG MUN SEL PHAN BDE RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS RUS RGYAS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I RGYUD DU BLTAMS PA GSUNG RAB KUN LA LTA BA'I BLO GROS KYI MIG DANG LDAN PA, AER TE NI ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DPAL GRUB KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL BA'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
